artist: Painter: After Filippo Lauri; Engraver: Giovanni Vitalba; Publisher: John Boydell
inscription:
Signature, Title, Date, and Inscription

in plate in black below image: Filippo Lauri Pinxit   G. Vitalba Sculpsit/ SUMMER/ From the Original Picture of the same Size painted by/ Filippo Lauri in the aCollection of this Grace/ the Duke of Devonshire/ Vol II No.2  John Boydell execud't 1766 (a coat of arms is in the center of the inscription) | 1-635
title: Summer
